website_summaries.verdict: With a design mirroring the night sky, the Hybrid Sky from Puma gives runners a race-ready performance. With a midsole combination of some of the brand's top-tier technologies, the road running shoe supplies efficiency and pronounced comfort. Although loaded with a lot of technical features for a reliable function, the running platform does not compromise when it comes to delivering a featherlight construction.
pros: A lot of the runners highly commend the versatile wear of the Puma Hybrid Sky
The running platform enables natural toe splay, observed several wearers
Quite a few testers hail the snug wrap of the running shoe
According to a number of buyers, the road running shoe is very comfortable
Some of the athletes appreciate the lightweight composition of the platform
cons: One commenter has expressed that the laces of the neutral running shoe are too short
Multiple reviewers state that the running shoe lacks cushioning

customer_reviews.title: Just OK
customer_reviews.text: To be totally honest these puma are just OK I do believe Adidas boost is more cushion then These but for the price you can’t really go wrong not really a cross trainer you’re not really a running shoe there more of just a every day casual shoe on the same path as Nike and Adidas I would say no but for the price and if all your Going to do is walk around the mall Or hang out at the bar in these puma Fit the bill
customer_reviews.author: dan

customer_reviews.title: Size off.
customer_reviews.text: I wear 11 1/2 I bought size 12 to be safe and it is still tight. Should have bought a full size bigger.
customer_reviews.author: VKYung

customer_reviews.title: So close to ideal
customer_reviews.text: Overall, a great shoe. Comfortable, supportive, excellent external fit and finish, looks sharp as can be. The nitpicks: the sole wears down faster than most, as there's not a lot of tread. Inside, the heel is breaking down after 30 days (regular use, about 5-6 miles per day of walking).
customer_reviews.author: JV in FL

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable Shoes
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my son and he loves how light weight they are. He says that they are very comfortable and we are both very happy with the shoes and the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Malisia

customer_reviews.title: Puma ups there Game!
customer_reviews.text: Puma has really come out with some nice summer Shoes. Well made nice arch and Comfortable! Hybrids are my personal Favorites.
customer_reviews.author: Markis

customer_reviews.title: Another one 👍
customer_reviews.text: I am Puma fan, this is on of the best design and comfort, I have a flat foot and I can walk all day with no issue, love it.
customer_reviews.author: Mohannad

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight shoe
customer_reviews.text: I love this sneaker. It’s light it’s soft its comfortable. I can wear it all day. It’s cute too.
customer_reviews.author: Keishe

customer_reviews.title: Love These
customer_reviews.text: Great style and look. Would have preferred wide fit but not available however only slightly narrow. Love the look.
customer_reviews.author: Lefty58

customer_reviews.title: Premium quality
customer_reviews.text: I always like the design of Puma. Good quality as always. Very light and comfortable. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Carole Yu

customer_reviews.title: Great fit and fantastic styling
customer_reviews.text: Fit very well, laces are a little short when run through all eyelets ( petty, I know ). First wear was an extended event and my feet felt great, seriously looking at all the other color options now
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Shoes!!!
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable. Wore all day long first day without any issues.
customer_reviews.author: John_In_Vegas

customer_reviews.title: Look at MY NEW PUMAS!!!!!!!’nb
customer_reviews.text: These Pumas are great. While wearing them I get many comments!!! The bright neon YELLOW can not be ignored.....I love them!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Definitely looking to buy in another color.
customer_reviews.text: Theres nothing not to like about this shoe! Multiple complements. Will definitely buy another.
customer_reviews.author: Konisi Hosea

customer_reviews.title: I don’t normally wear sneakers!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love the fit and support for a falling arch! It’s Feels like I’m running on clouds!!!
customer_reviews.author: Tyra Freeman

product_meta.title: PUMA Men's Hybrid Sky Sneaker
product_meta.description: The hybrid sky is the freshest everyday cushioned runner. The hybrid foam is a mix of our two most innovative midsole foam ignite and nrgy. The nrgy beads provide instant cushion and comfort while the ignite foam provides fantastic responsiveness to propel you faster.
